sentences.en: An educator must first educate himself.
sentences.cn: 教育者必须自己先受教育.

sentences.en: Check the AASECT website to find a certified sexuality educator , counselor, or therapist in your area.
sentences.cn: 查看AASECT网站,将为你找到你所在地区的有资质的性教育 、 咨询或治疗学家.

sentences.en: Even a moral educator should not beat others without reason.
sentences.cn: 训育主任也不能乱打人啊.

sentences.en: Everyone must become an educator and learn to live.
sentences.cn: 每个人都必须成为教育者,必须学会生存.

sentences.en: Newman was a well known English educator on higher education.
sentences.cn: 纽曼是英国著名的高等教育思想家.

sentences.en: Patrick Pearse ( 1879 ? 1916 ), leader of Irish nationalism and Irish poet and educator.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克·皮尔斯 ( 1879-1916 ), 爱尔兰民族主义领袖,诗人,教育学家.

sentences.en: Rote memorization has been the educator's standard operating procedure for centuries.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来,死记硬背一直是教育工作者奉行的标准教学方法.

sentences.en: That educator published many articles in these magazines.
sentences.cn: 那位教育工作者在这些杂志上发表了许多文章.

sentences.en: The answer is easy - I'm an educator.
sentences.cn: 答案其实很简单 — 因为我是一名教育者.

sentences.en: The Confucius is the thinker, educator, founder of the Confucianism.
sentences.cn: 孔子是我国古代著名的思想家 、 育家 、 家学派创始人.

sentences.en: The man who can make hard things easy is the educator.
sentences.cn: 能使艰难之事变得容易的人是教育者.

sentences.en: The teaching secretary an administrator an educator.
sentences.cn: 教学秘书既是管理者,又是教育者.

sentences.en: The television producer today has to be part news person, part educator.
sentences.cn: 今天的电视制片人必须既是新闻人，又是教育者。

sentences.en: To Leung ( Quangzhou ): Art educator, performance artist, performed in Quangzhou Sharpness and other exchanges.
sentences.cn: 杜梁 ( 广州 ): 艺术教育工作者 、 为艺术家, 曾参与[东锐利]其他.

sentences.en: What more could an educator hope for than a student's desire to learn.
sentences.cn: 除了学生的学习兴趣，教育者们别无所求。

sentences.en: You can also talk to your diabetic educator if you like.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意你也可以问糖尿病的卫教人员.

words.tran_cn: 训练；教导；培育（educate的过去分词形式）
教育家；教育工作者；教师

trans.tran_en: a teacher or someone involved in the process of educating people
